author: R Vimal Kumar
text:
Judicial Magistrate Srividhya remanded the five persons who were arrested in connection with the murder of Dalit youth V. Shankar (22) at Udumalpet on Sunday, till March 30.

The accused were, M. Manikandan (25), P. Jegadeesan (31), M. Madan alias Michael (23), P. Selvakumar (25) and M. Manikandan (39), all hailing from Dindigul district.

Case registered

Udumalpet police registered the case in the murder of Shankar and the attack on his wife, Kausalya, under Sections of 302 (murder), 147 (rioting), 148 (rioting with deadly weapons), 307 (attempt to murder) and 109 (guilty of an offence punishable under Section 302) of the IPC, and SC and ST (Prevention of Atrocities) Act.
title: 5 accused remanded in prison
